extendedInfo.description: Keep your prayer list at your fingertips and schedule reminder notification *pops* for when you want to pray each day.Features:+ Record a subject and details for each of the people or things you are praying for.+ Mark prayers as answered to remind you to give thanks.+ Set how often you want to pray for each prayer concern: every pop, once daily, once on a specific day of each week, or on a rotating basis.+ View prayer list by requested pop frequency and "answered" status.+ Configure daily start and stop times for pop notifications and how many times you want to pray during those times. Prayer Popper automatically schedules your prayer times and notifies you when it is time to pray.+ Set how many of your rotating prayer concerns you want to pray for at one time.+ Pray on demand with "Pop Now" or "Review Last Pop".+ Share prayers with friends via e-mail or text message.+ Backup and restore your prayers for free through January 31, 2012.+ Learn how to use all of the features with our in-app help documentation.

reviews.title: Almost perfect!
reviews.comment: This app is almost perfect for my needs!  I actually turn the automatic \"popper\" feature off and just manually pop the prayer requests when I\'m ready to sit down and pray.  The only thing that I think needs to be changed is answered prayers need to be removed from the main prayer list, so as to not clutter it.  It also will keep \"popping\" the answered prayers unless you actually delete them.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: What I was looking for in a prayer app... It has definitely helped me to improve my prayer life.
reviews.author: Keith L Hamilton

reviews.title: Necessity for all!
reviews.comment: Absolutely my favorite app. One possible improve, can one of the options for pop up date be random ? I.e. Instead of picking one specific day or every day , an option for any or random day would be great . Otherwise perfect .. Keep it up !
reviews.author: Roger Browning

reviews.title: brilliant
reviews.comment: just what I was needing to program prayer across a week
reviews.author: Sam Griffiths

reviews.title: Good, but have a suggestion
reviews.comment: I like the basic concept. Would it be possible to categorize each prayer? (Family, Missions, Friends, Personal,church, etc.?) You would need the ability to create categories. Then to have the option to view the prayers by categories. This would just add another dimension to the functionality of the app.
reviews.author: Joseph Campbell

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I just installed this earlier today and I love it already! Its the simple tool I need to remind me to pray for those on my list. Its so easy to get distracted in the busyness of the day but now my notification pops up and depending on what Im doing I can pray a quick prayer or longer. Thanks for this app.
reviews.author: Cathy Upton

reviews.title: A blessing
reviews.comment: Really great app for helping you established a focus prayer life. Beat my expectations once I got into it.
reviews.author: Andrew Kyle

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I like the functionality of the app.  We should pray more often and this app is the perfect reminder tool for that.  I would like to see a spot for a date/time stamp of when the prayer was entered.
reviews.author: Richard Gutoski

reviews.title: Fun app to prompt prayer
reviews.comment: Like the basic structure and features, and the option to turn the audible \"pop\" off. After a meeting or something I still see the logo in the notification bar and pray then. Suggestion - a way to sort prayers by date rather than by alphabetical order of the subject.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: I love this. I can remember to pray about all those little things now, and it helps me to remember to follow up with others about their needs i have been praying about. good app. thank you.
reviews.author: nate hickman

reviews.title: Simple and elegant
reviews.comment: Fantastic app.  It is simple and works like a charm.  It is helpful in reminding me to pray without ceasing.  It allows backup of your items, but I would love to see a sync between devices so I could keep requests on my phone and tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for me. I choose one person a day to pray for with every pop, a few to pray for once a day and the rest rotate through. I pray consistently now, and for more people. What a smart idea for an app. I could see this format used for note cards/flash cards too. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good start
reviews.comment: I wish it had more options to chose when and how often it pops.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing that it works
reviews.comment: So I tried installing thinking that the popups would start to get annoying, but then I noticed something... I started feeling guilty for not praying before dismissing the notification... Great work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I can not say enough good about this app. You make a list of prayers. You set how often you want to pray. The app does the rest. As you go about your day it pops a prayer. Very simple and effective.  Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does it job
reviews.comment: Since i have an android gadget, i installed it. And it does the job, reminding me when to pray.
reviews.author: Ronny Marshal

reviews.comment: Love it! All I have to do is pray; this app makes sure I don\'t forget anyone...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Great reminders throughout the day to pray for specific people/situations.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is a great way to keep you in prayer mode. Only change I would like to see is \"random\" pops. The rotating rotates alphabetically instead of random. Besides that, awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple & effective app
reviews.author: Bawany Satgunanathan
